name: Elec Dude (MisteryJay)
description:
Dr. Darkglass would like to usurp World domination with its Mini Robots. But the kind hearted "Elec Dude" wants to prevent that by taking all his Energy away from him.

Features: 

- Retro Style
- Pixel Graphics
- Chiptune Sound
- Unique Gameplay
- 20 Level

Movement:

- All Direction Buttons 

Have Fun!!!
